title: Exclusive NY State Stay on Award-Winning Montauk Marina with Direct Beach Access & Three Eateries
description: All of Montauk's nautical pleasures are at your fingertips at Montauk Yacht Club, the preferred stay of New York's discerning boaters and sun-seekers. With equal parts seaside charm and old-world glamour, this renowned stay redefines luxury. Arrive off the dock and be met with sparkling views of the marina, named one of the top ten in North America. Lounge poolside with views of Lake Montauk abound, or lay undisturbed on the private stretch of Star Island beachfront. Dine across three intimate eateries, sip frozen libations by the water and spend a summer sojourn anchored in opulence in the USA's most coveted beach town.
offer_address: 32 Star Island Rd, Montauk, NY 11954, United States
